targets.rawSql:
SELECT AttributeTemplate.Name AS Attribute,
	DATE_FORMAT(TagValue.Timestamp, "%c/%e/%y %r") AS Timestamp,
	ROUND(TagValue.Value, 2) AS Value
FROM ElementAttribute
	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementAttribute.ElementId = Element.ElementId
	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementAttribute.AttributeTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId
	INNER JOIN Tag ON ElementAttribute.TagId = Tag.TagId
	INNER JOIN TagValue ON Tag.TagId = TagValue.TagId
WHERE Element.ElementId = $element AND Tag.LookupId IS NULL AND $__timeFilter(TagValue.Timestamp)
UNION
SELECT AttributeTemplate.Name AS Attribute,
	DATE_FORMAT(TagValue.Timestamp, "%c/%e/%y %r") AS Timestamp,
	LookupValue.Name AS Value
FROM ElementAttribute
	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementAttribute.ElementId = Element.ElementId
	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementAttribute.AttributeTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId
	INNER JOIN Tag ON ElementAttribute.TagId = Tag.TagId
	INNER JOIN Lookup ON Tag.LookupId = Lookup.LookupId
	INNER JOIN LookupValue ON Lookup.LookupId = LookupValue.LookupId
	INNER JOIN TagValue ON Tag.TagId = TagValue.TagId AND LookupValue.Value = TagValue.Value
WHERE Element.ElementId = $element AND Tag.LookupId IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(TagValue.Timestamp)

list.label: Enterprise:
list.name: enterprise
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Enterprise.EnterpriseId AS __value, Enterprise.Name AS __text FROM Enterprise 	INNER JOIN Site ON Enterprise.EnterpriseId = Site.EnterpriseId 	INNER JOIN ElementTemplate ON Site.SiteId = ElementTemplate.SiteId 	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = Element.ElementTemplateId

list.label: Site:
list.name: site
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Site.SiteId AS __value, Site.Name AS __text FROM Site 	INNER JOIN ElementTemplate ON Site.SiteId = ElementTemplate.SiteId 	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = Element.ElementTemplateId WHERE Site.EnterpriseId = $enterprise

list.label: Element Template:
list.name: elementTemplate
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId AS __value, ElementTemplate.Name AS __text FROM ElementTemplate 	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = Element.ElementTemplateId WHERE ElementTemplate.SiteId = $site

list.label: Element:
list.name: element
list.query: SELECT Element.ElementId AS __value, Element.Name AS __text FROM Element WHERE Element.ElementTemplateId = $elementTemplate
